summary.description:
personalized prioritization of driver genes.

Personalized prioritization of driver genes in cancer.

The details of the method are described in Dinstag G. & Shamir R. PRODIGY: personalized prioritization of driver genes. bioRxiv (2018), https://www.biorxiv.org/content/early/2018/10/30/456723.

This R package prioritize driver genes for individual cancer patients.

||| NAME (Prodigy) SIMILAR TO (PUB. DIFFERENT) bio.tools/prodigy (PRODIGY)
summary.name: Prodigy_autogenerated
